author: mrmitch
title: Hard to find - Saw it, bought it - Glad its in collection
review: I came across this set at a hospital gift shop on the clearance table and picked it up. It was for my then 6 yr old daughter and she adored it and used it for awhile, not its safely in the LEGO closet. You can arrange pieces to spell your name or code words etc. the kids like that about the pen.
